name: Pokémon Rumble U
description: Toy Pokémon are popular items that fly off the shelves at the Toy Shop. One day, some capsules filled with Toy Pokémon accidentally drops into the river - a river that sets them adrift to a far-off place. The Toy Pokémon start a journey that they hope will lead them back to the Toy Shop. But blocking their way stands their fellow Toy Pokémon! Battle your way through the enemies surrounding you and experience an epic adventure! The world of Pokémon Rumble U is split into several Areas with fearsome Bosses. Get ready to take on multiple battle stages as you progress through each Area - you'll have to be victorious in each one to continue forward. Collect Pokémon Rumble U NFC Figures to help you on your journey. NFC Figures can be scanned to receive that Toy Pokémon in-game and powered-up using money gathered in the game to use their special traits in battle.
